issue.title: [CF 645] Hide when in vehicle or Pet battle option
issue.body:
Hi, the addon is great.. but sometimes we dont need the buttons... i know there's a option to hide out of combat, but i like to still track my cooldowns and buffs out of combat, but when i'm inside a vehicle, ex demolishers, or during pet battle i would like to hide those buttons... i would love to see those implemented.

And thx for the addon. help me a lot.


> Posted by CurseForge user jcsanches18 | Imported from CurseForge issue #645 | Raw

comments.body:
There already is a condition that can check whether or not you are in a vehicle. Only a pet battle condition would be needed to achieve the functionality that you have described.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Added a condition to check if you are in a pet battle in r624. Note that I have not yet tested it, so let me know if it doesn't work.

It can be found in the "Player Attributes" condition category. Also note that the icon for the condition will be pretty messed up until I can find one that fits the condition well.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I downloaded r624 but I am unable to find the option for pet battles under Unit attributes in conditions. Am I looking in the wrong place?


> Posted by CurseForge user faithangel7

"Player Attributes", not "Unit Attributes"
